entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HybridCache.RemoveAsync calls RemoveByTagAsync instead of RemoveAsync #56581
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #56579
  • Register Location Changing Handler unexpectedly refresh the application when trying to set a hash #56574
  • About RateLimiting middleware get RateLimiterOptions #56573
  • Add CreateNamedPipeServerStream to named pipes options #56568
  • Add named pipes methods to Kestrel configuration loader #56565

Closed

  • End of message callback for connections #56449
  • Perf regression: json #56527
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #56554
  • Perf regression: single_query #56571
  • Blazor WebAssembly Error: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'out') after Publishing #56537
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #56572
  • Cannot do request filtering on invalid requests as blazor expects to use the fallback #56507
  • Add PageModel SignIn and Signout methods to ComponentBase for OIDC #56510
  • Change wwwroot to Assets in Razor Class Library #56552
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #56528

PullRequests

Created

  • Support IAsyncEnumerable<T> and ChannelReader<T> with ValueTypes in SignalR native AOT #56583
    area-signalr
  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking
  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    area-networking
  • Add more logging to StreamPool_ManyConcurrentStreams_StreamPoolFull #56570
    area-networking
  • Add CreateNamedPipeServerStream to named pipes options #56567
    area-networking
  • Add named pipes methods to Kestrel configuration loader #56563
    area-networking

Merged

  • Fix comment typos in build props #56544
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview7
  • Simplify SignalR Client IAsyncEnumerable usage #56561
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview7
  • [release/8.0] Don't require latest runtime patch for Blazor DevServer #56181
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.8
  • [release/8.0] Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #56300
    area-blazor, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.8
  • [release/8.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56270
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.8
  • Update branding to 6.0.33 #56576
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.33
  • Update branding to 8.0.8 #56577
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.8
  • Update Selenium dependency to 4.22.0 #56564
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Always ref request body and response schemas and fix nested types #56513
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • Don't use diagnostics memory pool in GracefulTurnsAbortiveIfRequestsDoNotFinish #56281
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Quarantine StreamPool_ManyConcurrentStreams_StreamPoolFull #56562
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore to 6.6.2 #56266
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Do not close connection for http1.0 when client request connection keep-alive #56558
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24351.1 #56546
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as Array instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Set readOnly status for properties and support OpenApiServers #56470
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56459
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `34ad51b` #56545
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56273
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Enable internal runtimes and disable old creds #56428
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Allow streams to get disposed while being transmitted to the browser #56557
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Switch to dSAS for internal runtimes #56488
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Switch to dSAS for internal runtimes #56487
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • gRPC JSON transcoding + Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi #56067
    area-grpc
  • Add overloads for problem and validation problem results that accept `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<,>>` #56368
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
